title: Disconnection from chat.
body:
After the most recent patch I've been having issues regarding staying connected to the chat client. After a while of being logged in I will often get disconnected from the league chat with no ability to reconnect other than closing and logging in again. This also happens after every game I play, which prevents me from chatting in the end game lobby. 

I've tried a few older solutions such as flushing dns, disabling ip helper but to no avail :/.
In game I'm not lagging or anything either the chat itself is the only thing not working.

replies.body: So I switched to a wired connection, allowed everything stated under my firewall, configured my dns, used the indicated website for packet loss/buffering, release and renewed my ip, and flushed my dns. All to no avail. The only thing I haven't tried was port forwarding which I don't have any access to my router's settings. But I do know however that nothing has changed related to its settings since before the problem has arised and it the chat itself has been working prior to this problem.

The chat servers are separate from the game and matchmaking servers, so you could only be encountering issues being routed to that one subset of servers. As a first stop, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety to ensure your local network settings aren't causing this to happen.

Let me know if you continue to have these disconnections after working through that guide.
